abstract: Gunmen shoot several people in restaurant on Hesingen island near Gothenburg, Sweden, killing at least two, in incident police characterize as gang-related.
lead_paragraph: Several people were shot and at least two died inside a restaurant in a suburb of Sweden’s second-largest city, Gothenburg, in what the police said might have been an act of gang-related violence.

headline.main: Sweden: At Least Two Are Killed as Gunfire Erupts in Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Europe; Sweden: At Least Two Are Killed as Gunfire Erupts in Restaurant

snippet: Several people were shot and at least two died inside a restaurant in a suburb of Sweden’s second-largest city, Gothenburg, in what the police said might have been an act of gang-related violence.
